Description: Coming spring 2018 – 283 brand-new luxury apartments. Welcome to The Vine, Maple Lawn's first taste of contemporary, high end apartment residences. Just fifteen minutes from downtown Columbia but surrounded by expansive forest, these brand new homes generate both a contemporary and rustic feel. Come home to one, two, or three bedroom apartments with high end finishes and access to 10,000 square feet of amenity spaces including a fitness center, cyber café/conference room, two-story club room with televisions and billiards, and direct access to the outdoor courtyard with a sparkling pool and dog park.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Oven
* Refrigerator
* Breakfast Nook

Description:
(301) 656-8765 - Beautiful Multi-Level Property & Amazing Amenities! - Welcome home to your almost brand new 2 level condo located in the hot new spot in Howard County: Maple Lawn! Enter into the main level where you'll notice the den/office/guest room with gas fireplace. Just down the hall is a full bathroom and entry to the one car garage. Take the stairs up to what will really impress you. The kitchen has rich wood cabinets, stone counter tops, stainless steel appliances and big breakfast bar. Enjoy a meal in the dining area or relax in the living room bathed in sunlight from the ample windows. With a master bedroom, second bedroom and 3rd full bathroom, this property will make you and yours very comfortable.
What draws people to Maple Lawn is the incredible amount of amenities. Located near restaurants, shopping, Harris Teeter and more. You'll also have access to the outdoor pool, community center with modern gym, tennis court, picnic area and large grass fields. 
Email Lauren Mitchum at Lauren@StreamlineManagement.com to see this great home today!
Lease terms:
12 month minimum lease
No smoking inside the property
Renter's insurance required
Water included in rent; resident to pay electric and gas
1 dog accepted; sorry, no cats
No Cats Allowed
(RLNE3581355) Other Amenities - Other- tennis courts, bbq grilling area, Pool, Exercise Facility. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
Gorgeous 3 Bedroom + Den/2.5 Bath Townhome located in Fulton, MD convenient to shopping, restaurants, I-95 and route 29. Beautiful flooring throughout, tile, wood and carpet. Master suite with tray ceiling and soaking tub. Walk-in closet and ceiling fans. Kitchen features granite countertops, and stainless steel premium appliances. Enjoy a two car garage and Community Pool.
Email or call now to schedule a showing!!!
301-637-7368
leasing@realpropertymetro.com

- Everyone 18 and older MUST apply
- Under 600 credit score will be denied
- Under 650 may require up to 2 months deposit
- Must gross at least 3x your amount of rent
- Must have good rental history
